replies.msg:
呢張form真係絕不應該填，因為馬逢國係其中一個推送中條例的大旗手之一，如果我應該係畀楊雪盈


香港的新型冠狀病毒疫情持續，各體育教練面對前所未有的逆境，現誠邀各教練簽署以下聲明書，冀香港政府能夠向大家施以援手，協助渡過難關。
聲明書將交予立法會(體育、演藝、文化及出版界)馬逢國議員。
The outbreak of Coronavirus epidemic in Hong Kong has continued, and sports coaches are facing unprecedented adversity. All coaches are now invited to sign the following statement, we hope that the Hong Kong government can lend a helping hands to everyone through the difficult times.
The statement will be passed to the Legislative Council (Sports, Performing Arts, Culture and Publication) Mr. MA Fung-Kwok (Legco Member) .
